full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGRUB PA'I THABS, ,BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS PA, ,BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI, ,LUNG RTOGS YON TAN @008B GYIS MDZES LHA'I BTZUN PA, ,TSUL KHRIMS THO YON ZHES BYAS SNGA MO NAS, ,NAN GYIS BSKUL KYANG DAL 'BYOR STONG ZANG LA, ,GZHAN DON MING BTAGS RNAM GA-YENG NGANG LUS PA, ,DRANG ZHING BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS ZHES BYA BAS, ,SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS BDAG DANG 'GRO BA KUN, ,DENG NAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MA THOB PAR, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO NYID DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,'DI YI CHOS TSUL TSUL BZHIN NYAMS BLANGS TE, ,TSE GCIG NYID LA SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING BRGYAN DU BYON, ,LEGS SO, ,)
